entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow. Local blowing snow in the evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 27 February 2023
